description:
As Hanataro does his best to heal Renji, it`s up to Rukia, Kurodo and Orihime to fight off the Bount, Yoshi and her vicious dolls.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Breaking Up of the Substitute Team? The Betrayal of Rukia
Rupture dans l`équipe de remplacement ?! La trahison de Rukia
代行チーム分裂? 裏切ったルキア
